short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reorganize popular lyrics sites to display all the lyrics on one page without needing to scroll.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're a musician or doing karaoke, reading lyrics from the popular sites becomes problematic if you need to scroll down. This fixes it by splitting each section into columns on the page. All the information on one screen.
